predictions.text: You may choose to stop receiving communications from us, except certain important notifications such as billing and account security alerts
predictions.description: You can opt out of promotional communications

predictions.text: We will not lock you out of your own data

predictions.text: You may export your 1Password data at any time you wish during the life of your account

predictions.text: If you discontinue payment, your account will enter a frozen (read-only) state for a period not less than six months during which you may still retrieve and export your data
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: Right to Have Your Data ErasedAs we are merely custodians of your data, account owners have the right to instruct us to remove data permanently from our systems
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: To ensure that no one’s data is deleted without their consent, you must first delete your account through an authenticated session
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: After your account has been deleted, the account owner may contact us and ask for the data to be expunged.
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: Once the request is authenticated, the data will be removed from our active systems within 72 hours
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: Erasure requests will leave those backups untouched, and we will only remove data from backups if legally compelled to
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: We also use third party analytics packages for our public pages that may set cookies on your computer
predictions.description: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics and/or advertising

predictions.text: Users may remove all such information from their devices, but doing so will require that they provide complete information (account details, Master Password, and Secret Key) on subsequent sign-ins
predictions.description: You can request access and deletion of personal data

predictions.text: Consent for Underage EnrollmentThose under the age of 16 may not use the services without the consent or authorization of their parent or legal custodian
predictions.description: Only available to users of a certain age

predictions.text: We maintain the right to send you annoying email informing you of substantive changes
